articles.author: AP
articles.title: US stocks fall again as uncertainty over Ukraine war persists
articles.description: The S&P 500 fell 1.3% after having been up 0.7% in the early going. The benchmark index marked its fourth losing week in the last five. The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 0.7% and Nasdaq composite slid 2.2%. Both also posted a weekly loss.

articles.title: India may relook inflation, growth projections, says RBI deputy governor Michael Patra
